database.name: VIEW SCACTU_LOAN_FEE
database.view: SELECT ca.sspr_concept_amount_id AS scactu_loan_fee_id, pa.ad_client_id, pa.ad_org_id, ca.created, ca.createdby, ca.updated, ca.updatedby, 'Y' AS isactive, pa.sspr_payroll_aut_id, ca.c_bpartner_id, ca.amount FROM sspr_payroll_aut pa JOIN scactu_config_actuapar co ON co.ad_org_id = pa.ad_org_id AND co.isactive = 'Y' JOIN sspr_concept_amount ca ON ca.c_period_id = pa.c_period_id AND ca.sspr_concept_id = co.sspr_concept_id AND ca.em_scactu_is_actuapar = 'Y'
